songs.title: Running out of Time
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Alright

[Chorus 1]
I can see you, from a far
Taking notice, who you are
I know that you, can see me too
But if you plan to make your move
You better make it soon

[Chorus 2]
Baby, baby
What's your hesitation
Pretty soon you're going to
Lose my attention
I don't know what's going on in your mind
But you're running out of time

[Chorus 3]
Running out of time
Oh, you're running out of time
You're running out of time
Oh, you're running, running
Out of time

Something like that?

[Chorus 1]

[Chorus 2]

[Chorus 3]

[Chorus 1]

[Chorus 2]

[Chorus 3]

[Chorus 2]

[Chorus 3]
